message: The biggest issue will be parking... I wonder if the new space has a good parking spot we can use.
I've been wanting to get a bus to convert to a hackbus - mobile hackerspace - we can use it to pick things up etc... http://hackbus.info/index.php/Main_Page
no, the biggest issue is money like every issue
Maybe then, a good deal in a lot close by, say $30 a month (shared among bus driving members)
That's at least a few months away, I'm talking something sooner.
if you have enough money parking is not an issue at all
then it is not in nyc
a flying saucer instead of a bus
I think we have enough to manage and make awesome at our new space, let's focus on that
